Package index

All functions

apply_color_to_aa()
Coloring function that applies a gtseq palette

Create a Simple html Bar For a Bar Chart

takes a vector as input, generates breaks every n times

Get conensus frequency
get_consensus_return_bar()
Create a bar chart based on consensu
gtseq()
function that takes a dataframe, with sequences in one column, and creates a gt table

Multiple sequence alignment data

A series of color palettes for amino acid visualization

Prepares sequence data frame for gt visualization
